00043 //===========================================================================

00054 //===========================================================================
00055 struct cInteractionEvent
00056 {
00058     cGenericObject* m_object;
00059 
00061     bool m_isInside;
00062 
00064     cVector3d m_localPos;
00065 
00067     cVector3d m_localForce;
00068 
00070     cVector3d m_localSurfacePos;
00071 
00073     void clear()
00074     {
00075         m_object    = NULL;
00076         m_isInside    = false;
00077         m_localPos.zero();
00078         m_localForce.zero();
00079         m_localSurfacePos.zero();
00080     }
00081 };
